revised_title: Comparative Geology of the Red Sea and the Gulf of Aden
tldr: This article discusses the structure and evolution of the Red Sea and the nature of the Red Sea, Gulf of Aden, and Ethiopia rift junction. The author analyzes the geological data on both sides of the Gulf of Aden and reconstructs the pre-separation positions of the area to study the geological features and correlations between the two sides. The study provides insights into the tectonic history and the ongoing processes shaping the region.
